ygData.subject: Re: Today's patch
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yup, This, as usual, isn t a PvP enhancement but another nerf for high level players. -- Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Feb 23/00, Sylly Songsynger <jgs@...> wrote:
> From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
>
> Uhm, this is actually affects more that just duels.

> > From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
> >
> > Was apparently mostly server side, and didn't affect anything
> > player-related except for PvP (and duel)-related deaths. Now players
> > respawn with 0 mana if they were killed by another player.

Yup, This, as usual, isn't a PvP enhancement but another nerf for high
level players.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
